column2: My [Root.GetLordLady], there is a noble warrior at the gate. He says he is a veteran of many battles and desires to become a champion of your house. He praises your wisdom and honor and pledges to always defend you and your household if you will accept him in your retinue.

The influence of [target_child.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] has been extraordinary. Through the good example of [target_child.GetHerHis] guardian, [target_child.GetSheHe] is developing into a brave young [target_child.GetManWoman].

The influence of [target_child.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] has been extraordinary. Through constant practice with horse and blade, [target_child.GetSheHe] is developing into a strong young [target_child.GetManWoman].

The influence of [target_child.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] is great. [target_child.GetSheHe] is developing quite a taste for swordplay.

The influence of [target_child.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] is great. Through the good example of [target_child.GetHerHis] guardian, [target_child.GetSheHe] is learning the ethos of a just ruler.

My [Root.GetLordLady], your [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] has fallen most violently fallen off [target_child.GetHerHis] horse during practice at sword and lance with [target_child.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]!

You have, since a while, taken to wearing a pair of heavy, shaggy breeches for protection while practising your combat skills. Because of this, your kinsmen and friends have started to call you 'Ragnarr Lodbrok'.

Lately, you son Ragnarr has taken to wearing a pair of heavy, shaggy breeches for protection while practising his combat skills. Because of this, your kinsmen and friends have started calling him '[From.GetFirstName] Lo√∞brok'.
Welcome!
This could be good, or bad...
[target_child.GetSheHe] makes me proud!
I hope [target_child.GetSheHe] will come around!
I guess there is nothing I can do about it.
I like it!
No... there's no room.
[target_child.GetSheHe] should be careful...
That's my boy!
Such notions are for fools!
This is a most grievous wound!
That's my girl!

You are riding through your domains in the company of your household guard, when you come upon a bridge crossing a rapid river. On the bridge stands a dark-clad warrior in heavy armor with his sword drawn. When challenged, he refuses to get out of the way, speaking only the words: 'None shall pass'.

You grow weary of spending so much time in your castle, performing tedious duties of government and diplomacy. Meanwhile, [From.GetTitledFirstName] keeps telling you of all the interesting adventures he experiences in your service. But perhaps you could join him next time he rides out...

You ride out one fine morning in the company of [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick], taking no escort and wearing practical rather than regal attire. This will be a good break from the monotony of your court. You catch [From.GetTitledFirstName] giving you a sceptical look, but you are sure this will be a fine journey.
[From.GetFirstName], take care of this!
Yes, I think I will!
What could possibly go wrong?
What a strange man. I will kill him myself.
No, I must tend to my duties as [Root.GetTitle].
Hmm, let's take another road.
